effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to [catch]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
なにかの　記念の　品として
特別に　つくられた
かなり　珍しい　ボール。

A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
crafted in order to commemorate
a special occasion of some sort.

Poké Ball molto esclusiva creata per
commemorare un evento speciale.

Es una Poké Ball bastante singular que se creó
para conmemorar alguna ocasión especial.

Ein seltener Ball, der als Reminiszenz an irgendein
Ereignis hergestellt wurde.

Une Poké Ball plutôt rare qui fut créée pour
une occasion spéciale.

무언가의 기념품으로
특별히 만들어진
상당히 진귀한 볼.

なにかの　きねんの　しなとして
とくべつに　つくられた
かなり　めずらしい　ボール。

A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.

A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.

Une Poké Ball plutôt rare qui fut créée
pour une occasion spéciale.

A quite rare Poké Ball that has been
specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.

specially crafted to commemorate
an occasion of some sort.
